title: Maker Of Durex Condoms Now Also Owns Baby Formula Brand

organizations.name: durex condoms now also owns baby formula brand

text:
Maker Of Durex Condoms Now Also Owns Baby Formula Brand "They're just covering all bases for when the condom fails. Smart, I like the move." 02/10/2017 11:09 am ET Jenna Amatulli Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Bloomberg via Getty Images 
Acquisitions in business happen all the time, but this one has some people wondering if could be a borderline a conflict of interest. 
British consumer goods company Reckitt Benckiser, maker of Durex condoms, Air Wick fresheners, and more, just agreed to buy Mead Johnson Nutrition, maker of Enfamil baby formula. 
Talk about a company that wants to cover all your needs. 
Social media has been abuzz about the acquisition since its announcement early Friday. Owner of Durex just bought a company that makes baby food ü§î #StayWoke Boss : our condoms are very safeEmployee : what if they fail ?Boss : nice idea https://t.co/sRFu6ZxIh7 ‚Äî Pakchikpak Raja Babu (@HaramiParindey) February 10, 2017 Hardly an incentive for Durex to keep up quality control. https://t.co/DIfStXm7eB ‚Äî Stanley Pignal (@spignal) February 10, 2017 Owners of Durex buy baby formula company. Isn't that a conflict of interest? ‚Äî Cranky Nurse (@Cynical_Nurse) February 10, 2017 Durex company now also to make baby food after $16.6 bn deal. What can possibly go wrong? https://t.co/ocVvn2q6lr ‚Äî Jitendra Joshi (@jitjoshi) February 10, 2017 
Despite the humor in it, the $16.6 billion deal is really just another extension of Reckitt Benckiser‚Äôs journey within the consumer health sphere. 
‚ÄúThis is a natural extension to R.B.‚Äôs consumer health portfolio of power brands, which are already trusted by millions of mothers, reinforcing the importance of health and hygiene for their families,‚Äù said Rakesh Kapoor, Reckitt Benckiser CEO, in a press release. 
So, whether you‚Äôre looking to have a baby or, you know, not, Reckitt Benckiser has you covered. Condom Dresses
